alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 11 at 1:40PM CDT until further notice by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Cache River Near Patterson affecting Jackson and Woodruff Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cache River Near Patterson. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Low swampy timberland along the river begins to flood. Flood gates should be closed and equipment moved out of the low grounds along the river and tributaries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 8.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening, Aug 11th, and continue rising to a crest of 9.1 feet just after midnight tonight Saturday, Aug 12th. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Cache River Patterson 9.0 8.9 Fri 1 PM 9.1 9.0 9.1 9.1 1 AM 8/12 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
